analysis.description:
TestSale.Reco (/unique_chucks/26/0xc589acb9da47e14a7131e7a1aa7bf577a7f5d2fd.sol#364-369) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(token.balanceOf(msg.sender)) (/unique_chucks/26/0xc589acb9da47e14a7131e7a1aa7bf577a7f5d2fd.sol#367-368)

TestSale.finish (/unique_chucks/26/0xc589acb9da47e14a7131e7a1aa7bf577a7f5d2fd.sol#346-363) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(multisig,restrictedTokens) (/unique_chucks/26/0xc589acb9da47e14a7131e7a1aa7bf577a7f5d2fd.sol#356-358)
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/26/0xc589acb9da47e14a7131e7a1aa7bf577a7f5d2fd.sol#358)

TestSale.createTokens (/unique_chucks/26/0xc589acb9da47e14a7131e7a1aa7bf577a7f5d2fd.sol#370-374) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(msg.sender,msg.value) (/unique_chucks/26/0xc589acb9da47e14a7131e7a1aa7bf577a7f5d2fd.sol)

Reentrancy in TestSale.finish (/unique_chucks/26/0xc589acb9da47e14a7131e7a1aa7bf577a7f5d2fd.sol#346-363):
	External calls:
	- issuedTokenSupply = token.totalSupply() (/unique_chucks/26/0xc589acb9da47e14a7131e7a1aa7bf577a7f5d2fd.sol#349-351)
	- token.mint(multisig,restrictedTokens) (/unique_chucks/26/0xc589acb9da47e14a7131e7a1aa7bf577a7f5d2fd.sol#356-358)
	- token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/26/0xc589acb9da47e14a7131e7a1aa7bf577a7f5d2fd.sol#358)
	External calls sending eth:
	- multisig.transfer(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/26/0xc589acb9da47e14a7131e7a1aa7bf577a7f5d2fd.sol#359)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- reco (/unique_chucks/26/0xc589acb9da47e14a7131e7a1aa7bf577a7f5d2fd.sol#362)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/26/0xc589acb9da47e14a7131e7a1aa7bf577a7f5d2fd.sol:
